name: p\_duration\_until\_test\_result
description: probability that it takes $d$ days between the performance of a PCR test and receiving the result.

name: share\_of\_tests\_for\_symptomatics
description: share of positive PCR tests that are performed on individuals because of Covid-19 symptoms

name: share\_w\_positive\_rapid\_test\_ requesting\_pcr
description: share of individuals with positive rapid test that seek a PCR test

name: share\_known\_cases\_without\_ rapid\_tests
description: share of cases that would be detected in the absence of rapid tests (see Section~\ref{sub:testing})

name: symptomatic\_multiplier
description: share of symptomatic individuals that still have contacts of type $c$

name: positive\_pcr\_multiplier
description: share of individuals with a positive PCR test that still have contacts of type $c$

name: positive\_rapid\_test\_multiplier
description: share of individuals with a recent positive rapid test that still have contacts of type $c$
